measures.name: Weekly Forecast Report Title
measures.expression:
VAR Warehouse =
    SELECTEDVALUE(primary_warehouses[warehouse_code], "ALL")
RETURN
SWITCH(
    Warehouse,
    "CLT", "Weekly Forecast Report ▸ BSF | Charlotte",
    "LAS", "Weekly Forecast Report ▸ BSF | Las Vegas",
    "MSO", "Weekly Forecast Report ▸ BSF | Missoula",
    "Weekly Forecast Report ▸ BSF"
)
